W_ADVERTISEMENT.NAME: Adempiere, Inc.
W_ADVERTISEMENT.ADTEXT:
Adempiere, Inc. privides Support and Services for Adempiere, the premier Open Source business application. Guaranteed Support is available in Gold/Silver/Bronze level you want to keep your mission critical system running and up-to-date. All support offerings include all licenses you may need for Adempiere. We offer Intensive Training to get you started fast end allow you to implement Adempiere efficiently. The Technical Training gives you a head start when extending Adempiere to meet specific business requiredments.
